issue.title: [C++] Add bundled external project for aws-sdk-cpp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10068](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10068). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `build_awssdk` errors with a FIXME message. We should fix it. aws-sdk-cpp is not widely available on package managers, and in some cases (like Homebrew) its cmake config is broken.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10068?focusedCommentId=17208349) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8304
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8304>
